chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
pr: protocol
I: dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop
ii: InductiveInv pr I
s: state

Goal:
s \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> s \In Coh (mkWorld pr)

Premises:
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
mkWorld = fun p : protocol => (plab p \\-> p, Unit) : protocol -> world
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)] : world -> Pred state
ProtocolWithIndInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop), ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I -> Protocols.protocol
InductiveInv = ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv : protocol -> (dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) -> Type Arguments InductiveInv _ _%function_scope
List.In : forall A : Type, A -> seq A -> Prop
pred = fun T : Type => T -> bool : Type -> Type Arguments pred _%type_scope
nid = nat : Set
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I s : state |- Type] ?T' : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I s : state |- Type] ?f : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I s : state |- ?T -> ?T'] ?x : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I s : state |- ?T'] ?s : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I s : state |- seq ?T]
stIn : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I) (s : ProtocolWithInvariant.SendInv p I), s \In sts ii -> snd_transI (st_inv (s:=s)) \In snd_trans (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)
rely_refl : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s : state), s \In Coh w -> network_rely w this s s
getInvSendTrans : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))) (z to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (s1 : state) (h : heap), st \In snd_trans (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> forall S : send_safe st z to (getStatelet s1 (plab p)) msg, Some h = send_step S -> exists st' : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol (mkWorld p) (plab p))), [/\ st' \In get_st (mkWorld p) (plab p), t_snd st' = t_snd st, all_hooks_fire (mkWorld p) (plab p) (t_snd st') s1 z msg to & exists S' : send_safe st' z to (getStatelet s1 (plab p)) msg, Some h = send_step S']
rtIn : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I) (r : ProtocolWithInvariant.ReceiveInv p I), r \In rts ii -> rcv_transI (rt_inv (r:=r)) \In rcv_trans (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)
Coh0 : forall (w : world) (s : state), w = Unit -> s = Unit -> Coh w s
cohS : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> valid s
cohD : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> dom w =i dom s
Coh_dom : forall (w : world) (l : Label) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet), l \in dom s -> Coh w s -> dom (dstate (getStatelet s l)) =i nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)
unit_coh : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> w = Unit < -> s = Unit
cohW : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> valid w
cohH : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> hook_complete w
coh_coh : forall (w : world) (s : state) (l : Label), Coh w s -> coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)
coh_s : forall (w : world) (l : Label) (s : state), Coh w s -> coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)
Mem_map : forall (T T' : Type) (f : T -> T') (x : T) (s : seq T), x \In s -> f x \In [seq f i | i <- s]
In_split : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : seq_PredType T), x \In s -> exists s1 s2 : seq T, s = s1 ++ x :: s2
all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getLocal n (getStatelet s lc)) (getLocal n (getStatelet s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> nid -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop Arguments all_hooks_fire _ _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
CohUn : forall (w1 w2 : world) (s1 s2 : state), Coh w1 s1 -> Coh w2 s2 -> valid (w1 \+ w2) -> Coh (w1 \+ w2) (s1 \+ s2)
cohVl : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> valid (dstate d)
cohVs : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> valid (dsoup d)
send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
In_cons : forall (T : Type) (y : T) (s : seq T) (x : T), x \In y :: s < -> x = y \/ x \In s
Idle : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2
Transitions.s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
cohDom : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d
nodes = Protocols.nodes : Protocols.protocol -> dstatelet -> pred nid
prEq : forall p : protocol, getProtocol (mkWorld p) (plab p) = p
cohpred_PredType = fun nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid => mkPredType (Coherence.sort (nodes:=nodes)) : (dstatelet -> pred nid) -> PredType dstatelet Arguments cohpred_PredType _%function_scope
consume_msg = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => match find id s with | Some m => upd id (mark_msg m) s | None => s end : soup -> mid -> soup
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
